text: And a believing man from among Pharaoh’s people who had kept his belief a secret, said, “Do you kill a man ( just ) because he says: My Lord is God and he has come to you with clear proofs from your Lord? And if he is a liar then on him will be ( the responsibility of ) his lie, but if he is truthful, then something of that which he is threatening you ( with ), will afflict you. God certainly does not guide him who is extravagant, a liar
